alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:06PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Porter County through 445 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gary and Ogden Dunes, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, penny size hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portage, Chesterton, South Haven, Porter, Burns Harbor, Ogden Dunes, Town of Pines, Beverly Shores and Dune Acres. This includes...Indiana Dunes State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
